```{r setup}
library(simulatr)
```

Simulate some longitudinal data:

```{r}
simulate_longitudinal_data(
  slope = -1, intercept = 10, 
  random_effects_vcov = matrix(c(
    .25^2, .1,
    .1, 2^2
  ), byrow = TRUE, nrow = 2),
  residual_sd = 0.5,
  observation_times = c(2, 6, 12, 36, 52), 
  n_individuals = 10L, 
  seed = 42L
)
```
